XIII.ii.2.C.1.b
.
When Not to Take Adjudicative Action
Do
not
take adjudicative action solely for the purpose of issuing a disability preference certificate.Â  If no rating decision of record exists, explain to the Veteran the requirements of a claim for SC benefits.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C - State or Municipal Disability Preference Certificate
citation: Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C
